overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains a presence across Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, focusing on research in social media analysis, disinformation, and computational social science. Total followers across all platforms amount to 3580. The content generally receives a moderate level of engagement, with LinkedIn showing a higher engagement rate due to its professional networking focus.

contentThemes.description: Posts related to research grants, publications, and methodological approaches in computational social science.
Content focused on detecting and studying disinformation campaigns and coordinated inauthentic behavior on social media platforms.
Posts advertising research positions and opportunities for students in the field.

recommendations: Increase posting frequency on Mastodon to improve visibility.
Use platform-specific hashtags to broaden reach (e.g., #SocialMediaResearch on Bluesky and Mastodon, #DataScience on LinkedIn).
Engage more actively with followers by responding to comments and questions.
Share visual content (images, videos) to increase engagement.

platformInsights.bluesky: Bluesky shows a strong interest in research publications and conference presentations, indicated by the high repost rates. PhD research opportunities also generate significant interest.
platformInsights.mastodon: Mastodon engagement is comparatively lower. Content focused on specific tools and methodological discussions may resonate better with the audience. Increase visibility through boosted posts.
platformInsights.linkedin: LinkedIn is highly receptive to posts about research grants and job opportunities, demonstrating the platform's professional focus. Continue sharing announcements and calls for collaboration.
